Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: begin declare @age int select @age = DATEDIFF(year,@dob,getdate()) return @age end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create function Age(@dob date) returns int as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @AGE INT SET @AGE = DATEDIFF(YEAR,@DOB,GETDATE()) RETURN @AGE END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION AgeCalculator(@DOB DATE) RETURNS INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin declare @age int
set @age = DATEDIFF(year,@DOB,GETDATE()) - case when (Month(@DOB) > month(getdate()) ) or (Month(@DOB) = month(getdate()) ) and (day(@DOB) > day(getdate())) then 1 else 0 end return @age end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create function CalculateAge(@DOB date) returns int as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: begin declare @noyear int select @noyear = DATEDIFF(YEAR,@year,GETDATE()) return @noyear end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create function fn_sinceEndSale(@year date) returns int as

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: create function fn_studentbyid(@id int) returns nvarchar(20) with schemabinding as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
( select * from tblemployee where DepartmentId = @departmentid
)

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create function frtest(@departmentid int) returns table as return

Property.Name: ExpressionScript
Property.Value: ([price]*[quntity])

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: begin select IIF(TRY_PARSE(@x as int) is not null,'True','false') end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin declare @age int select @age = DATEDIFF(year,@dob,getdate()) select @age as age end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT @Totalstudent = COUNT(Studentid) FROM dbo.tbl_Students WHERE Gendar = @Gendar END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM dbo.customer ORDER BY Fname END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE spCustomer AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT CustID,Fname
FROM dbo.customer
WHERE CustID = @custid AND Fname = @fname
ORDER BY Fname
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
INSERT INTO tbl_Students(Studentid,Firstname,Lastname,Gendar,Email)
VALUES (@studentid,@fname,@lname,@gendar,@email)
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM [dbo].[tbl_Students] END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROC [dbo].[spSelectStudents] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT Gendar,COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[tbl_Students] WHERE Gendar = @gendar GROUP BY Gendar END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: begin try insert into dbo.employee values (@empid,@fname,@lname) end try begin catch select ERROR_NUMBER() as ErrorNumber ,ERROR_MESSAGE() as ErrorMassage ,ERROR_PROCEDURE() as ErrorProcedure ,ERROR_STATE() as ErrorState ,ERROR_SEVERITY() as ErrorSeverity ,ERROR_LINE() as ErrorLine end catch

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin begin try begin transaction update dbo.tblPhysiclAddress set city = 'Ethio' where addressid = 1
update tblMailingAddress set city = 'India' where addressid = 1 commit transaction print 'succesfull' end try begin catch rollback transaction print 'un succesfull'
end catch end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE procedure spUpdateAddress as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: begin select * from [dbo].[tblemployee] end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER tr_select_tblemployee ON [tblemployee] for insert as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin declare @id int select @id = Id from inserted
insert into tblemployeeAudit values ( cast(@id as varchar) ,'new customer with Id = ' + cast(@id as varchar) + ' added on ' + cast(GETDATE() as varchar)) end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE trigger tr_tblemployee_ForInsert on dbo.tblemployee for insert as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
begin declare @depid int select @depid = dep.DepartmentId from tbldepartment dep join inserted ins on ins.DepName = dep.DepName
if (@depid is null) begin raiserror('error',16,1) return end
insert into tblemployee (Id,Name,Sallery,Gendar,DepartmentId) select Id,Name,Sallery,Gendar,@depid from inserted
end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE trigger [dbo].[tr_vWEmployeeByDepartment_InsteadOfInsert] on [dbo].[vWEmployeeByDepartment] instead of insert as

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT dbo.tblemployee.Id, dbo.tblemployee.Name, dbo.tblemployee.Sallery, dbo.tblemployee.Gendar, dbo.tblemployee.DepartmentId, dbo.tbldepartment.DepartmentId AS Expr1, dbo.tbldepartment.DepName FROM dbo.tbldepartment INNER JOIN dbo.tblemployee ON dbo.tbldepartment.DepartmentId = dbo.tblemployee.DepartmentId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW dbo.View_my AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select empid,fname,lname from dbo.daki

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create view vw_daki with schemabinding as

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select e.Id,e.Name,e.Sallery,e.Gendar,d.DepName from dbo.tbldepartment d join dbo.tblemployee e on d.DepartmentId = e.DepartmentId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create view [dbo].[vWEmployeeByDepartment] as

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select e.Id,e.Name,e.Gendar,e.DepartmentId from dbo.tblemployee e

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create view vWEmployeeDataExeceptSalary as

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select e.Id,e.Name,e.Gendar,e.Sallery,d.DepName from dbo.tbldepartment d join dbo.tblemployee e on d.DepartmentId = e.DepartmentId where d.DepName like 'IT'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create view vWITEmployee as

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select e.Id,e.Name,e.Gendar,d.DepName from dbo.tbldepartment d join dbo.tblemployee e on d.DepartmentId = e.DepartmentId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create view vWnonConfidencialData as

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: select d.DepName, COUNT(e.Id) as NumberOfEmployee from dbo.tbldepartment d join dbo.tblemployee e on d.DepartmentId = e.DepartmentId group by d.DepName

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: create view vWSummerizedDataByDepartment as
